key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges related to consumer data privacy and lending practices
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities, including significant data breaches
Economic sensitivity to interest rates and housing market trends
Competitive pressures from both online and traditional financial institutions
controversies: Class action lawsuit over a 2022 data breach affecting 200,000 consumers
Data breach at subsidiary QuoteWizard leading to stolen and auctioned customer data
social_issues: Customer complaints regarding lender match quality, aggressive marketing, and data-sharing practices
governance_issues: Moody's downgrade of Corporate Family Rating to B3 due to financial leverage and operational challenges

sources.title: Class action lawsuit over LendingTree data breach headed to mediation
sources.snippet: Lending Tree data breach class action lawsuit overview: Who: Christopher Lamie filed a class action lawsuit against LendingTree, LLC. Where: The class action lawsuit was filed in North Carolina federal court.
